properties.areaDesc: Colorado Springs Vicinity/Southern El Paso County/Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Northern El Paso County/Monument Ridge/Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft
properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 30 at 7:56PM MST by NWS Pueblo CO
properties.description:
Areas of snow showers, heavy at times, will continue sagging south
across El Paso County through 9 pm. The focus of the snow will be
along the I-25 corridor and west, though snow has fallen across
eastern El Paso County as well. 3 inches of new snow was reported
in Monument as the wave of snow moved through.

Where the snow has fallen this evening, very localized patchy fog
may develop during the overnight hours. Otherwise plan on
clearing skies and a very cold start Friday morning.
